remarks: In an undirected simple graph, two adjacent edges form a walk between two (different) vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.)
statement:
usg2wlk $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ { A , B } e. ran E /\ { B , C } e. ran E ) -> E. f E. p ( f ( V Walks E ) p /\ ( # ` f ) = 2 /\ ( A = ( p ` 0 ) /\ B = ( p ` 1 ) /\ C = ( p ` 2 ) ) ) ) $.
$d A f p $.
$d B f p $.
$d C f p $.
$d E f p $.
$d V f p $.
